body:
Comment 2: 
I think you can reopen an issue by writing something like

update issue NNNN

Status: Accepted

in the change message.  See
https://code.google.com/p/support/wiki/IssueTracker#Integration_with_version_control

I guess that the codereview tool could implement "hg undo" by changing "fixes issue
NNNN" to the above.  That is probably the best we can do.
